subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Metta World Peace, who was waived Friday by the Lakers, became a free agent Sunday after no team put in a claim for him. The Knicks and the Clippers had interest.
snippet: Metta World Peace, who was waived Friday by the Lakers, became a free agent Sunday after no team put in a claim for him. The Knicks and the Clippers had interest.
